page.title: 04ACTIVITIES AT LEIGHTON PARK
page.content: There are many things to do at Leighton Park. The School boasts of more than 60 hobbies and activities. These include obscure pastimes as well as the more common ones, some of which are:caving, stage lighting, motor mechanics, debating society, saxophone quartets,silversmithing,radio control,yoga, bee_keeping,railway society, canoe_building and others like electronics, swimming or community service. Sports are also quite important in the School. Amongst the more successful ones is canoeing.Former Leighton Park canoeists have received International recognition for their high calibre of paddling.Some have even become of Olympic Standard. So the canoe building can be of some importance!
